alert.note: Alert for Audrain; Boone; Callaway; Monroe; Ralls (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 3:04AM CDT until August 12 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Ralls County in northeastern Missouri... Southeastern Boone County in central Missouri... Central Audrain County in central Missouri... Callaway County in central Missouri... Southeastern Monroe County in northeastern Missouri... * Until 400 AM CDT. * At 304 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Paris to near Mexico to near Murry to near Columbia, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Columbia, Fulton, Mexico, Holts Summit, Santa Fe, Columbia Regional Airport, Auxvasse, Perry, New Bloomfield, Laddonia, Chamois, Lake Mykee Town, Martinsburg, Shamrock, Williamsburg, Lake Mykee, Mokane, Rush Hill, Kingdom City, and Benton City. This includes Interstate 70 in Missouri between exits 131 and 161. This also includes Rock Bridge State Park and Jewell Cemetery Historic Site. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
